Card.Name: Kitesail Freebooter
Card.RulesText: FlyingWhen Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

Card.Name: Barrier of Bones
Card.RulesText: DefenderWhen Barrier of Bones enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Card.Name: Stitcher's Supplier
Card.RulesText: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

Card.Name: Seekers' Squire
Card.RulesText: When Seekers' Squire enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Card.Name: Mire Triton
Card.RulesText: DeathtouchWhen Mire Triton enters the battlefield, mill two cards and you gain 2 life.

Card.Name: Orzhov Enforcer
Card.RulesText: DeathtouchAfterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

Card.Name: Dusk Legion Zealot
Card.RulesText: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Card.Name: Priest of Forgotten Gods
Card.RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Any number of target players each lose 2 life and sacrifice a creature. You add {B}{B} and draw a card.

Card.Name: Plaguecrafter
Card.RulesText: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

Card.Name: Isareth the Awakener
Card.RulesText: DeathtouchWhenever Isareth the Awakener attacks, you may pay {X}. When you do, return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a corpse counter on it. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

Card.Name: Dread Shade
Card.RulesText: {B}: Dread Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Windgrace Acolyte
Card.RulesText: FlyingWhen Windgrace Acolyte enters the battlefield, mill three cards and you gain 3 life.

Card.Name: Lotleth Giant
Card.RulesText: Undergrowth — When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.

Card.Name: Necrotic Wound
Card.RulesText: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

Card.Name: The Eldest Reborn
Card.RulesText: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)I — Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.II — Each opponent discards a card.III — Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

Card.Name: Memorial to Folly
Card.RulesText: Memorial to Folly enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add {B}.{2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Folly: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
